text: Kya tum logon ne yeh samajh rakkha hai ke yunhi chodh diye jaogey halanke abhi Allah ne yeh to dekha hi nahin ke tum mein se kaun woh log hain jinhon ne (uski raah mein) jaanfishani (exerted your utmost) ki aur Allah aur uske Rasool aur momineen ke siwa kisi ko jigri dost na banaya, jo kuch tum karte ho Allah ussey ba-khabar hai
